overview: Reo (Taka Zahara) is a human raised by a wolf who is trained by Barda (Ratno Timoer), the Blind from the Ghost Cave.  He lost his father, mother and younger siblings, who were held captive by an evil character who was also greedy in a place called the Green Hell.  The journey to find his parents and younger sibling had to go through many obstacles and naturally also fights.
title: Reo, The Werewolf
